dict.acceptation: （心脏等）跳动；搜索；（风、雨等）吹打；（鼓）咚咚地响；
[美国口语]大吃一惊的；[常作 B-]“反传统一代”成员的；摇滚音乐的；[口语]（体力或情绪上）疲劳不堪的；

sent.orig: Can you conjugate ' to beat' in all its tenses ?
sent.trans: 你列得出动词'beat'的所有时态变化吗？

sent.orig: Therefore, training should be basic beat beat and three beat the second began.
sent.trans: 因此，节拍训练应从基本的二拍子和三拍子开始。

sent.orig: Beat cream cheese with sugar until creamy, gradually add the eggs and yolk, beat uhtil creamy.
sent.trans: 奶油芝士与糖打至滑身，徐徐打入鸡蛋及蛋黄，搅至软滑。

sent.orig: Cuba beat the Unified Team in the preliminary round and we beat Cuba.
sent.trans: 古巴队在预赛中战胜了联合队，而我们又战胜古巴队。

sent.orig: Bob was able to beat Bill at billiards, but Bill always beat Bob badly at badminton.
sent.trans: 鲍勃在台球上能打败比尔，但是打羽毛球比尔常常打败鲍勃。
